      • generateFeature

        public boolean generateFeature(java.util.Random random,
                      int chunkX,
                      int chunkZ,
                      World world,
                      boolean newGen)
        Description copied from interface: IFeatureGenerator
        Generates the world feature.
        Specified by:
        generateFeature in interface IFeatureGenerator
        Parameters:
        random - Random derived from the world seed.
        chunkX - Minimum X chunk-coordinate of the chunk. (x16 for block coordinate)
        chunkZ - Minimum Z chunk-coordinate of the chunk. (x16 for block coordinate)
        world - The world to generate in.
        newGen - True on initial generation, false on retrogen.
        Returns:
        True if generation happened, false otherwise.
